name: folly
content:
folly noun
(STUPIDITY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] formal the fact of being stupid, or a stupid action, idea, etc.: She said that the idea was folly. [ + to infinitive ] It would be folly for the country to become involved in the war.
